title: +&-=X Exhibition
content:
Hello all,

I wanted to put the word out on this exhibition to those in Melbourne between now and the 5th May.

**+&-=X: 20 Years of typo-graphics from the Tokyo Type Directors Club**

The work on display is excellent and of the highest standard, what's more is it's a hands on exhibit, meaning the real work is on show and you are able to pick everything up and have a closer look at all of the work.

+&-=X Exhibition

Faculty Gallery  
Monash University  
Art & Design Building  
900 Dandenong Road  
Caulfield East 3145  
Melbourne  
Australia

Opening hours:

Monday - Friday  
10 am to 5 pm  
Saturday  
1pm to 5pm

Check it out if you can, it is well worth it.

Cheers,  
Barry.
author: Barry Spencer
